ThingDef.label: corn wort
ThingDef.description: Wort made from corn. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable whiskey.

ThingDef.label: rice mash
ThingDef.description: Milled, soaked, and cooked rice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable saki.

ThingDef.label: undistilled vodka
ThingDef.description: Fermented vodka. This substance needs to be filtered and distilled at a brewery before it becomes drinkable vodka.

ThingDef.label: berry wine must
ThingDef.description: Pressed strawberry juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable strawberry wine.

ThingDef.label: cider must
ThingDef.description: Pressed apple juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable hard cider.

ThingDef.label: sugarcane mash
ThingDef.description: Milled, soaked, and cooked sugarcane. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable rum.

ThingDef.label: wine must
ThingDef.description: Pressed fruit juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable wine.

ThingDef.label: agave must
ThingDef.description: Pressed agave juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable tequila.
